title: Link’s Shower Window Update | Ear Biscuits Ep.287
description:
A dirty skylight, a shower wand, and a shower window were the ingredients to success in Link’s latest shower adventure. Additionally, the guys discuss debatable topics such as Nesquik powder or chocolate syrup, whether to close blinds slat up or down, and whether it’s grosser to borrow your friend’s toothbrush or your partner’s toothbrush in this episode of Ear Biscuits!
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
